thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 21 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Insulet Corp Posts Q4 Loss Per Share $0.12

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Insulet Corp Posts Q4 Loss Per Share $0.12
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - Insulet Corp:
* INSULET REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER REVENUE OF $130.5 MILLION, UP 26%, AND GROSS MARGIN UP 210 BASIS POINTS, EXCEEDING EXPECTATIONS
* Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.12 * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $560 MILLION TO $580 MILLION * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 26 PERCENT TO $130.5 MILLION * FOR QUARTER ENDING MARCH 31, 2018, COMPANY EXPECTS REVENUE IN RANGE OF $119 TO $123 MILLION
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.08, REVENUE VIEW $125.2 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 REVENUE VIEW $119.7 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $554.3 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
